author: hwright
msg: * notes/wc-ng-design:
Add a (sparse) section about the implementation end game.

author: hwright
msg: Remove the last calls to svn_wc_create_tmp_file2(), but introducing a local
helper to create an empty temporary file.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/update_editor.c
(get_empty_tmp_file): New.
(add_file_with_history, merge_file): Use the helper to create empty temp
files.

author: rhuijben
msg: Following up on r40244, install the property install loggy items
directly in the work queue, instead of via the loggy accumulator handed
over to allow replacing the implementation with a wq operation without
changing the callers.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/props.c
(svn_wc__install_props): Remove log accumulator argument and install
directly.
(svn_wc_merge_props3): Update caller.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/props.h
(svn_wc__install_props): Update documentation and prototype.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/update_editor.c
(close_directory): Update caller.
(close_file): Update caller.
(install_added_props): Update caller.
(svn_wc_add_repos_file4): Use a log accumulator for the work before
changing the properties and one for the work after updating the
properties, and at the end put everything in the wq.

author: stsp
msg: * tools/dev/unix-build/Makefile.svn: New. I've been using this for a while
to build and test my development builds. Hyrum suggested I put it here
in case someone finds it useful.

author: hwright
msg: * subversion/include/svn_wc.h:
Add more doxygen links to structs and defines.
